live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39447.summary: Some customers in the La Casa area of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39447.title: July 11 – Kelowna (La Casa) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
